_aChangeLog.text: Total improvement of comlete Navigation Mesh
Improved bot's movement through all stairways

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation file for the map DE_BATTLEBRIDGE

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: July 3 2016

Here is the Navigation Mesh for amazing medieval architecture themed map de_battlebridge by Labmonkey / Bo Laugesen (relesed October 2010). It's fully created from scratch and carefully hand-tuned (manually optimized) .nav-file because original mapauthor's nav-file was not perfect.

More than a half of all auto-generated areas were remade manually. The special attention was paid to all numerous stairways.

Well... bots use all possible ways now and perfectly navigate with all map. Now they are fast, as swift as any arrow! :-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted (more detailed and more suitable to environment than in original).

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator available to downloading with the same map.

Play and Enjoy! Also your responses for me are still important ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes:   Labmonkey / Bo Laugesen (for castle-themed map)Additional Gratitudes:   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

One touch to the chapel door, how swiftly comes the arrow... ;-)
